sections.title: Simplifying Your Multi-Tenant AWS Management
sections.subtitle: Empower Your Infrastructure with TenantTech
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to **TenantTech**, your solution for seamless configuration and management of multi-tenant, multi-user AWS systems. Increase efficiency, security, and control in managing containers, databases, and S3 buckets with our intuitive platform.

images.name: HeroImage
images.description: An abstract digital cloud with integrated network lines symbolizing technology and connectivity.

sections.title: About TenantTech
sections.subtitle: Our Mission and Vision
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: At **TenantTech**, we understand the complexities involved in managing multi-tenant AWS environments. Our mission is to simplify these processes, allowing businesses to focus on their core competencies while leaving the tech management to us. Experience a tailored approach to cloud configuration that prioritizes scalability and ease of use.

images.name: AboutBackground
images.description: A high-contrast image of a bustling data center, symbolizing modern cloud infrastructure.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: What We Offer
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **AWS Container Management:** Efficiently handle Docker containers and orchestration.  
- **Database Configuration & Monitoring:** Streamline database setup and maintain optimal performance.  
- **S3 Bucket Setup & Optimization:** Simplify storage solutions with our hands-on management tools.

images.name: ContainerService
images.description: An image representing container management in cloud environments.

images.name: DatabaseService
images.description: An image symbolizing database management and monitoring solutions.

images.name: S3Service
images.description: A graphic showing optimized storage solutions with AWS S3 buckets.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Get in Touch Today
sections.name: ContactSection
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Looking to optimize your AWS setup? Contact **TenantTech** today for custom solutions:  
- **Email:** support@tenanttech.com  
- **Phone:** (123) 456-7890  
- **Address:** 123 Cloud Lane, Tech City

sections.title: Meet Our Team
sections.subtitle: The Experts Behind TenantTech
sections.name: TeamSection
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our team comprises cloud technology experts dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and support. Meet the people ensuring your infrastructure runs smoothly.
